Most professional photographers shoot in RAW for maximum editing potential.

chatgpt.answer: The best time depends on your subject and desired mood. Golden hour (first hour after sunrise, last hour before sunset) offers warm, soft light ideal for most photography. Blue hour (before sunrise, after sunset) provides cool, even lighting. Midday sun can be harsh but works for certain subjects. Overcast days offer soft, even light perfect for portraits and details.
